title: Teemo (R) Bug
body: Teemo's R usually lasts for 5 minutes. yet the timer doesn't go down at all so it lasts forever.

replies.body: The issue has been resolved. Thanks for your report!

Hey there,

Do you mean the timer on the individual shrooms?

As far as I'm aware this is a known bug with the timer incorrectly displaying the number of seconds left, however the actual timer IS going down and the shrooms will disappear, there is a fix slated for sometime in the near future so keep your eyes out for that!
